data.text: @RinieWagenaar65 @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre holy shit. you so don't understand how this conversation happened. you have learning problems. blocking you. because you're stupid
@MeanQualika @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre 🤣. At least I knew what I was talking about.
@RinieWagenaar65 @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre oh my god. go away loser.

@TrueNorthCentre I hope this is a bad joke? This would be utterly absurd as is the current mandate for crossing into the US. Now what we want is the lifting of mandate for air, sea and train barring the non vaccinated from travelling across provincial borders. Now that is no joke.
@MeanQualika @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre You continue to call me names as I continually call you out on your lie.   Now you say “ oh i was just joking”.    🤦‍♀️.    Nice try.
@RinieWagenaar65 @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre are you mentally challenged? I just said I was being facetious. learn words.

@MeanQualika @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre Just like I thought, you have no proof ( but called me a psycho). Again, show me your proof of the unvaccinated COMMERCIAL Drivers now able to cross the borders ( as you insisted was happening).
@RinieWagenaar65 @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre liberals are capitalists. wash your filthy mouth. just being a little facetious is all. just chill. they're going away.
@MeanQualika @AndrewMacMilla4 @TrueNorthCentre You’re a very misinformed liberal ( no surprise). Show me actual proof that you have of the borders being opened to unvaccinated COMMERCIAL drivers.
